content.rendered:
2022 Wimbledon Getaways Rates

Rates based on a package including two nights hotel stay and tickets for one day. Customize your package with extra nights, extra sessions, room upgrades and other add-ons.
Hotel PackagesCentre Court PackagesCourt No. 1 Packages
Park Plaza Westminster Bridge
from $4,695from $3,645
The Ritz Londonfrom $5,825from $4,775
The Corinthia Hotel
from $5,895from $4,845
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit at the time of booking. Final balance is due 90 days prior to travel. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.

2022 Wimbledon Semifinals and/or Finals Package Rates

Rates based on a package including three nights hotel stay and tickets for two days. Customize your package with extra nights, extra sessions, room upgrades and other add-ons.

Hotel PackagesSemifinals PackagesFinals Packages
Park Plaza Westminster Bridge
from $15,975from $16,975
The Ritz Londonfrom $17,685from $18,685
The Corinthia London
from $17,895from $18,895
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit at the time of booking. Final balance is due 90 days prior to travel. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
